conbody.p:
The Bricsys 24/7 Viewer contains:
Menu bar
Thumbnails: show or hide thumbnails
Add annotation
Download
Print to PDF
View, zoom and rotation buttons
Annotations: show or hide annotations
A counter indicates the number of annotations in a document.
Thumbnail pane
A thumbnail is displayed for each available page. Click on a thumbnail to open the corresponding page.
Current view of the document
The selected thumbnail is highlighted and the viewed area is indicated.
Status bar
The available layouts or sheets of a document are displayed via tabs.
Annotation pane
